member.name: M:TwinPalmsKPI.Controllers.FbReportsController.CreateFbReport(Entities.DataTransferObjects.FbReportForCreationDto)
member.remarks:
For GuestSourceOfBusinesses:\ Only use one object item and add as many objects you need to inside that one object.
Example:
[ \ { \ "GuestSourceOfBusinessId": 3, \ "GsobNrOfGuests": 33 \ }, \ { \ "GuestSourceOfBusinessId": 4, \ "GsobNrOfGuests": 44 \ } \ ]

member.name: M:TwinPalmsKPI.Controllers.OutletsFbReportsController.GetOutletsFbReports(System.Int32[],System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets All FbReports by many Outlet Ids between two Dates
member.remarks:
Gets all FbReports for many outlets between fromDate and toDate, including toDate
For example: to get the reports from only 2021-05-04
fromDate = 2021-12-02 toDate = 2021-12-02
